subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The president of the union representing Dallas police officers demanded an apology Thursday from Terrell Owens and the player’s publicist for comments he said impugned the reputations of three patrolmen.
snippet: The president of the union representing Dallas police officers demanded an apology Thursday from Terrell Owens and the player’s publicist for comments he said impugned the reputations of three patrolmen.
